Sentencas: Catalyst deactivation and mechanical failure are the major obstacles to the commercial application of methanefueled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: While integrating SOFCs with methane pre-treating system is considered as an effective measure to improve its stability.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Therefore, an integrated system of SOFCs and thermally selfsustained methane steam reformer (TS-MSR) is proposed in present work and a three-dimensional multi-physics model is developed to comprehensively evaluate its thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the design of TS-MSR should be paid attention when conducting the integrated system to achieve the balance between cell performance and stability.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An overdesigned TS-MSR would cause higher temperature, induce higher thermal stress and even break down the SOFCs.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The corresponding maximum temperature reaches 1311 K and the resulting thermal stress reaches 669 MPa where the failure probability is close to 1.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The mechanical failure is most likely to occur in the cathode porous electrode, despite the fact the highest stress exists in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This study makes up for the deficiency that previous literatures usually ignore the effect of prereformer design when conducting thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical analysis.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluating of thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical behavior for pre-reformed methane-fueled solid oxide fuel cell
